Articles.Content:
Yes, I joined that site. If you don't know what it is, look it up. I joined because I want to animate and have an outlet for it other than Youtube.

So yeah, here's my account: [http://raincrafter.newgrounds.com](http://raincrafter.newgrounds.com)

Ã¢â‚¬â€¹And I guess I should go now. Cheers, RAINCRAFTER.

EDIT: Might be closed soon. This is not a request.

EDIT2: Just close this and let it silently die.

EDIT3: Back up and will embed my single submission. Wait, I can't! (Oh Shucks.)

EDIT4: Just look at my first animation and tell me what you think for a noob.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-19T00:39:02Z" title="06/19/2015 12:39  AM" data-short="9 yr">June 19, 2015</time> by RAINCRAFTER**

> 
> You would probably be helping yourself if you were a little bit more forthcoming here.

Um... yeah; sorry about not telling the forum about me animating in flash.
Raincrafter is not a spammer, if you don't like the thread there's plenty of others to post in.
Yeah; sorry guys. Just telling everyone that I'm animating in flash and posting it on Newgrounds, and including the link for publicity.
Like a link in my sig?

Since my previous post got deleted, I will repost the helpful and relevant part:

> 
> A thread with just a link and some cryptic info is no good to anyone. It appears Raincrafter wishes his work is seen, so I am suggesting there might be more effective ways than the current approach, even if it is just an exciting description of why we absolutely should see this latest work or explaining why Newgrounds is a worthwhile platform to visit.
> Presenting your work favourably helps a lot.

I've reviewed your "Soda" animation as Antikytherian. Don't follow me, I just play games, though I've been pretty much inactive for a few months because I've been busy. The day I learn how to make a game or make art or music that I'm actually proud of is the day that hell turns into one big Budweiser-flavored ice cube, pigs fly at mach 35, and the Moon turns into a huge triangular block of Swiss Cheese.

> 
> I've reviewed your "Soda" animation as Antikytherian. Don't follow me, I just play games, though I've been pretty much inactive for a few months because I've been busy. The day I learn how to make a game or make art or music that I'm actually proud of is the day that hell turns into one big Budweiser-flavored ice cube, pigs fly at mach 35, and the Moon turns into a huge triangular block of Swiss Cheese.

Yay, thank you!

EDIT: \*facepalms\* My animation only has a 1 star rating. Definitely getting blamed. ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-19T00:41:33Z" title="06/19/2015 12:41  AM" data-short="9 yr">June 19, 2015</time> by RAINCRAFTER**
